extendedInfo.description: "Meow MahJong" is a simple mahjong game for beginners.How To PlayIt is a game to complete the hand role in the tiles of nine. 8 pieces of tile is hand from the top of the game screen. Four of the bottom is the operation button.Basic operation1.I throw away the unwanted tiles from the tiles of nine.2.Like new tile is displayed on the far left of the bottom.3.I repeat 2. 1. Hand role until completed.Â Â If you want to complete the hand role in Tsumo tile,1.I throw away the unwanted tiles from the tiles of nine.2.Like new tile is displayed on the far left of the bottom.3.I repeat 2. 1. Hand role until completed.4.I press the "Tsumo".5.Score display.If you go up in the tile the computer is discarded,1.I throw away the unwanted tiles from the tiles of nine.2.Like new tile is displayed on the far left of the bottom.3.In the state of one piece remaining hand role are aligned, to pay chip by pressing the "reach".4.I throw away the unwanted tiles from the tiles of nine.5.Tiles computer threw away the "Reach" is displayed.6.I repeat 2. 1. Auditor hand until it is flush.7.I press the "theory".8.Score display.
